name: Trigger Warning
author: Zing-Ming

sections.description:
Wrap the trigger content in [trigger][/trigger] to hide it. Example: [trigger]something terrible[/trigger] If you want to specify the type of trigger, you can do something like [trigger warning=”violent imagery”]something terrible[/trigger].

Readers can choose to read the trigger content by clicking on the “Show” button.
sections.installation: Unzip the zip file into the /wp-content/plugins/ directory. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

screenshots.caption: Wrap the trigger content in [trigger][/trigger] when you compose a Post.
Readers will have to click on the "Show" button to see the trigger content.
Readers can hide the trigger content again by clicking on the "Hide" button.
